dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4256 IH: Digital Coast Reauthorization Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Min (for himself, Mr. Wittman, Mr. Mullin, and Mr. Carter of Georgia) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Digital Coast Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Digital Coast Reauthorization Act of 2025.
Section 4 of the Digital Coast Act (16 U.S.C. 1467) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subsection (b)(1), by inserting and fully and freely available after readily accessible;
in subsection (d)(3)(D), by inserting , including data related to underground infrastructure and subsurface utilities after data; and
in subsection (g), by striking 2025 and inserting 2030.
